markdown: ###### Minor positive reputation with [Neketaka](/neketaka/);[Aamiina's Legacy](/aamiinasLegacy/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - The Steel Preacher | next = | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Wildrhymer | guid = beff3450-41da-4c2a-9301-5e1b25b5804a }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Uamoru, a nature godlike and pretender to the Kahanga throne, is attempting to foster rebellion against the leadership of Neketaka. Someone has placed a generous bounty on Uamoru's head. He's been tracked to an island east of Magran's Teeth where he and his pet lion are likely to defend against fortune-seekers. ## Walkthrough * Located in the far northeast part of the World Map, on an island east of the [Ofecchia Channel](/ofecchiaChannel/) at 5째 6' S, 66째 9' E. Drops [Aamiina's Legacy](/aamiinasLegacy/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Wildrhymer.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Uamoru the Pretender''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Uamoru, a nature godlike and pretender to the Kahanga throne, is attempting to foster rebellion against the leadership of Neketaka. He and his followers camp on an island east of Magran's Teeth. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Uamoru.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Someone has placed a generous bounty on Uamoru's head. He's been tracked to an island east of Magran's Teeth where he and his pet lion are likely to defend against fortune-seekers. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Nungata.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Uamoru's rebellion was short-lived. Nungaga in Serpent's Crown in Neketaka will pay generously for his head. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I dealt with Uamoru and claimed the bounty reward from Nungata. |}
